title: How can municipalities act as key change agents for a healthier Baltic Sea?
description: How can we work with the concept of Sustainable Blue growth on a city level to achieve a healthy Baltic Sea? Methods for international cooperation around environmental sustainable methods to achieve blue growth is discussed.
extendedDescription: What initiatives and investments have they identified? What hurdles have they faced – and overcome? What if there were 100-Cities working in this way by 2021?
